channel.title: australia plans on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in australia plans on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Australia- Nope
item.description: 7 September 1999 It has come to Jason and my attention that we won’t be able to get the cash necessary for our big trip down under by November. Maybe we can plan a smaller excursion, or a shorter one, or something. But for right now, we’ll be right here in the greater Houston area. More later.

item.title: Australia- Finances
item.description: ##13 July 1999 It’s four months until my trip. I’ll be out of town two weeks of those four months, fortunately, all in one spot, pretty soon from now. (end of July to 6 August) I need about 6000 dollars for the trip. Plus Scuba Certification. Am I worried? A little. Do I have a job? Not right now. How’s business? Okay, but not crazy cashflow. Hmmmm. I’d hate to take out a loan from my dad or a friend, and especially not from a credit card… But I really really want to go.

item.title: Tony Synchrony
Australia plans
item.description: (from my travel agent) ##21 May 1999 Here is our itinerary as faxed from my travel agent. It may change, but probably will not. Quote: Qantas Vacations Nov 5 - Depart Houston to Sydney Nov 6 - Arrive Sydney 1 night hotel reserved . Nov 10 - Depart Sydney to Ayers Rock (Qantas) 3 nights at Emu Walk Apartments [eating grubs with aborigines] . Nov 13 - Depart Ayers Rock to Sydney (Qantas) 1 night hotel reserved .

item.title: Australia plans
item.description: (14 Feb 2015, as I process old entries, I see this file didn't have a date, so I estimated) May 1999 (estimated) Jason called me and we began discussing plans. He’s been before, and wants to re-experience Heron Island on the Great Barrier Reef, but this time scuba certified. I’ve been before and want to re-experience Katoomba Falls, but this time when their roller coaster is open (Australian summer).

item.title: Jason invited me to OZ
